title: Cozero
description: Building the next generation Carbon Action Platform that enables companies to move their business towards carbon neutrality. Together, we can help reduce a major share of global carbon emissions and fight climate change. Our SaaS platform helps companies to track their carbon footprint and matches their emission profile with the best products and services that have the largest impact on the calculated carbon emissions. Based on our platform, carbon reduction becomes actionable. Become part of a Climate-Tech startup that helps companies to become a sustainable business and remain competitive in a future driven by constrained resources.
